== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Mobs ===
*{{EntityLink|Zombie}}, a common undead hostile mob
*{{EntityLink|Husk}}, a zombie-like mob that spawns in the desert and inflicts hunger when it attacks
*{{EntityLink|Drowned}}, a zombie variant that spawns in water or if a zombie drowns
*{{EntityLink|Zombie villager}}, a zombie variant that sometimes spawns instead of a zombie. When a zombie kills a [[villager]], it is zombified into a zombie villager.
*{{EntityLink|Zombified piglin}}, a zombified variant of the [[piglin]]
**{{EntityLink|Zombie Pigman}}, the former name and design of the zombified piglin
*{{EntityLink|Zoglin}}, a zombified [[hoglin]]
*{{EntityLink|Chicken jockey}}, a baby zombie riding a chicken
*{{EntityLink|Zombie Horse}}, a zombie hostile variant of the [[horse]]
*{{EntityLink|Camel Husk}}, a zombie hostile variant of the [[camel]]
*{{EntityLink|Zombie Nautilus}}, a zombie variant of [[nautilus]]

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
=== Mobs ===
*{{DuEntityLink|Zombie}}, a basic melee mob found in most places.
*{{DuEntityLink|Grim Guardian}}, an ancient variant of a zombie found within {{MCD|Grim Guardian Ancient Dungeon}}.
*{{DuEntityLink|Baby Zombie}}, a small and faster zombie variant.
*{{DuEntityLink|The Tiny Scourge}}, an ancient variant of a baby zombie found within {{MCD|The Tiny Scourge Ancient Dungeon}}.
*{{DuEntityLink|Chicken Jockey}} a baby zombie that spawns riding a chicken.
*{{DuEntityLink|Chicken Jockey Tower}} a chicken jockey variant that features multiple baby zombies stacked on top of each other.
**{{DuEntityLink|The Tower (mob)|The Tower}}, an ancient variant of a chicken jockey tower found within {{MCD|The Tower Ancient Dungeon}}.
*{{DuEntityLink|Husk}}, a zombie variant found only in desert missions.
*{{DuEntityLink|Frozen Zombie}} a snowy zombie variant that attacks with snowballs in the Creeping Winter DLC.
*{{DuEntityLink|Jungle Zombie}}, a mossy zombie that can inflict poison in the Jungle Awakens DLC.
*{{DuEntityLink|Drowned}}, an ocean zombie variant that appears in Hidden Depths DLC.
*{{DuEntityLink|Trident Drowned}}, a variant drowned with trident.
*{{DuEntityLink|Baby Drowned}}, a small variant of drowned.
*{{DuEntityLink|Vengeful Mariner}}, an ancient variant of a trident drowned found within {{MCD|Vengeful Mariner Ancient Dungeon}}.
*{{DuEntityLink|Drowned Necromancer}}, a boss variant of drowned.
*{{DuEntityLink|Zombified Piglin}}, a mob that attacks with a sword and has more piglin-like sounds than in {{MC}}.
*{{DuEntityLink|Zombified Piglin Hunter}}, a ranged zombified piglin variant that shoots targets with a crossbow.
*{{DuEntityLink|Zombified Fungus Thrower}}, a mob that throws [[MCD:Blue Nethershroom|Blue Nethershrooms]] which produce blue poison clouds.
*{{DuEntityLink|Zombified Baby Pig}}, a pet baby pig which is zombified.
